name: Hoang Duong Hotel - 115 NTT
address: 115 Nguyen Truong To , Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Ideal for fun and relaxation, Hoang Duong Hotel - 115 NTT is located in the Ba Dinh District area of Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

The facilities and services provided by Hoang Duong Hotel - 115 NTT ensure a pleasant stay for guests. Top features of the hotel include airport transfer.

All guest accommodations feature thoughtful amenities to ensure an unparalleled sense of comfort. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Hoang Duong Hotel - 115 NTT is your one-stop destination for quality hotel accommodations in Hanoi.
